Text:
Hye there, I've been downloading True Blood from you for a few episodes now.. In the past, I have no problem whatsoever with your reencode.. video and audio was great... but this time, the sound was bad.. it sounds distorted with noticeable skipping in a few parts... it's also louder than normal I think... the video is good... just the sound I think...

I dont know what's wrong and I want to stress that I've had no problem with your uploads before... but thanks for all your hardwork.. I really appreciate you doing small rips.. If it were'nt for you, I had to download 500mb file for 3 days before I can watch my favourite series.. thanks!

Sorry to hear that. Problematic are few shows, where first 30 seconds ("In previous episodes")louder  by 240% than the rest. Than - every segment between the commercials has different sound (AC3) matrix - 2 channels for fifteen minutes than 5.1 surround next fifteen and so on and on...
It is problem How Is Aired, and not How is Encoded by me. It took a while to even figure how to cope with that shit.
I was thinking to drop shows that causes problems. True Blood, Hung, Entourage for sure.

It would save hours of my time (for every such show I must demux the sound, load it into sound editor and mux back - then encode as any other show)  and - you'll have nothing to worry about.

Hi 20-40,
Thanks for youe encode/upload.

Cheers
Jon

Oh, I thought you used other upload source and just reencode it to make it smaller.. sorry then.. I hope you'd still do episode 12 of true blood.. it's the last one for the season... once again, thanks for all your hardwork...
twentyforty everything you do is amazing!! please be a dear and upload Beastly!! please!! I cant find it anywhere in the net!!
